availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James William Haggard (Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary L. Haggard. Father of Jerome Haggard, Ella Haggard, Robert L. Haggard, Cudellus Haggard, and Lucinda Haggard. Farmer in Fulton County in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population/Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton, District 1, p. 4.
Find A Grave, "James William Haggard (November 8, 1827-December 30, 1910)," Memorial #139477110, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/139477110 (accessed March 19, 2018).
